name: 2021 10th International Conference on Computing and Pattern Recognition
content: Publication: Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Special Issue: 1\. IET Journal-Cognitive Computation and Systems (Online ISSN 2517-7567) as a Special Issue, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, DOAJ, Google Scholar and IET Inspec and submitted to be reviewed by Scopus. 2\. International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing (IJMLC) (ISSN: 2010-3700) as a Special Issue, which will be indexed by Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, etc.
